<div align=center><h1>Zelk</h1>
<p>
Zelk is a smooth Discord theme inspired by the <a href=https://github.com/ZorinOS/zorin-desktop-themes>Zorin GTK theme</a>.</p>
<a href=https://betterdiscord.app/theme/zelk><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Better-Discord-3a71c1?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=flat-square&labelColor=black"></img></a>
<a href=https://github.com/schnensch0/zelk#powercord><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Power-cord-7289da?style=flat-square&labelColor=white&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></img></a>
<a href=https://github.com/schnensch0/zelk#goosemod><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Goose-Mod-101418?labelColor=818a93&style=flat-square"></img></a>
<a href=https://github.com/schnensch0/zelk/releases/latest><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/schnensch0/zelk?color=bde6fb&sort=semver&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></img></a>
<a href=https://discord.gg/tMEcBhsNqA><img src="https://img.shields.io/discord/733994169508560938?style=flat-square&logo=discord&color=5865F2&labelColor=white&label=support"></img></a></div>


### INSTALLATION
#### Powercord
```bash
git clone https://github.com/schnensch0/zelk.git
```

#### Better Discord
[Download](https://betterdiscord.app/Download?id=300) and move the file into your themes folder

#### Goosemod
Search for **Zelk** in the Themes tab

![Mockup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/schnensch0/zelk/main/preview/mockup.png)
for actual previews look [here](https://github.com/schnensch0/zelk/tree/main/preview)
